scientist.name: Diophantus
scientist.description: Diophantus is the first to use symbols for unknown numbers and abbreviations for powers of numbers, relationships, and operations. His Arithmetica is a collection of 150 solved problems.

scientist.name: Archimedes
scientist.description: Archimedes anticipated modern calculus and analysis by applying the concept of the infinitely small, derived an approximation of pi and and devised a system using exponentiation.

scientist.name: StartMathIdea
scientist.description: A Page from The Compendious Book on Calculation by Completion and Balancing, also known as Al-Jabr
scientist.descriptionRu: Страница из Краткой книги о восполнении и противопоставлении, названия которой произошёл термин алгебра
